brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to determine whether the Biomarkers (pro adrenomedullin (MR
      proADM), pro arginin vasopressin (CT proAVP), pro atrial natriuretic peptid (MR proANP), Pro
      Endothelin) changes at Day 2, Day 5 and Day 7 of ICU admission are correlated with
      Intravascular volume assessed by Cr 51 on red blood cells (Day 2 and Day 7) and by I 125 on
      albumine Day 7. The correlation of these Biomarkers are also evaluted with other markers
      such as erythropoietin and catecholamines. 80 ICU patients are included.

condition: Poly Trauma Patients Without Heart Failure

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  20 Cerebral Hemorrhage

          -  20 Head Injury

          -  20 post surgery non traumatic non neuro

          -  20 Polytrauma patients

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Heart failure NYHA III or IV

          -  Renal insufficiency creatinin clearance < 30 ml/mn

          -  age < 18 Y

          -  Pregnancy

intervention.intervention_name: Biomarkers, red blood cells and plasma assessment

clinical_study.official_title: Predictive Value of Biomarkers on Volemia, Extra and Intra Vascular Varation and Hydroelectrolytic Disorders in Different ICU Patients

primary_outcome.description: Correlation with total blood volume(assessed by Cr 51) and biomarkers(Mr proADM, Mr proANP, CT proAVP and proendothelin)changes
primary_outcome.measure: Predictive value of biomarkers changes in Volemia variation
primary_outcome.time_frame: at Day 2, Day 5 and Day 7 of ICU admission

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Correlation with efficient volemia and Biomarkers ( Mr proADM, Mr proANP, CT proAVP and proendothelin)changes.
secondary_outcome.measure: Predictive value of biomarkers changes with efficient volemia, fluid managements and other Markers such erythropoietin
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at Day 2, Day 5 and Day 7 of ICU admission

secondary_outcome.description: Correlation of Biomarkers changes with APACHE II and SOFA score and Mortality at Day 2, Day 5 and Day 7 of their ICU admission and at ICU discharge.
secondary_outcome.measure: Predictive value of Biomarkers with APACHE II and SOFA score and Prognosis at ICU discharge
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at Day 2 , Day 5 and Day 7 of ICU admission and at discharge

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Diagnostic
